mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board ( icategory, iuser, title, ctnt ) VALUES ( ${icategory}, ${iuser}, #{title}, #{ctnt} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, A.hits, A.rdt , B.nm AS username FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.isdel = 0 AND A.icategory = ${icategory} ORDER BY A.iboard DESC LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${recordCount}
SELECT A.iboard, A.icategory, A.title, A.ctnt, A.iuser, A.hits, A.rdt , B.nm AS username FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.isdel = 0 AND A.iboard = ${iboard}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(iboard) / ${recordCount}) AS result FROM t_board WHERE isdel = 0 AND icategory = ${icategory}
